DOC.brief_summary: This is an open-label, multi-centre single arm trial to investigate long-term safety and tolerability of degarelix in Korean patients with prostate cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Safety and Tolerability of Degarelix One-Month Dosing Regimen in Korean Patients
DOC.criteria: Has given written informed consent before any trialrelated activity is performed. A trialrelated activity is defined as any procedure that would not have been performed during the normal management of the patient Has completed the 7month main trial, FE200486 CS42 Has been withdrawn/discontinued from the FE200486 CS42 trial A patient may also not be entered into the CS42A trial at the discretion of the investigator due to safety or lack of efficacy concerns (LH or PSA response) in the CS42 trial.
